CustomField.description: Visual review status indicators showing approval workflow status. Formula field that displays review status icons based on task status and approval flags.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Status__c) = "In Review", "PM Review: " + IF(Reviewed_by_PM_Code_Reviewer__c, "Approved ‚úÖ", "Pending ‚è≥") + " ‚Üí Client Completion: " + IF(Client_Approved_for_Completion__c, "Approved ‚úÖ", IF(Reviewed_by_PM_Code_Reviewer__c, "Pending ‚è≥", "Waiting")), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = "Backlog", IF(Ready_for_Client_Review__c, "Ready for Review üìã ‚Üí Client Development: " + IF(Client_Approved_for_Development__c, "Approved ‚úÖ", "Pending ‚è≥"), ""), ""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula field displays review status with descriptive text and icons showing the approval workflow progress. For In Review tasks: Shows PM Review status and Client Completion Approval status. For Backlog tasks: Shows if ready for review and Client Development Approval status. Used for quick visual identification of review workflow progress in list views.
CustomField.label: Review Status Icons
